'''Elia Mervi''' is an artist who made the drawings used in several of the animated "[[Histories & Lore]]" featurettes in [[Season 3]] and [[Season 4]].

Mervi provided the drawings for:

'''Season 3'''
*[[The Vale (Histories & Lore)]]
*[[House Tully (Histories & Lore)]]

'''Season 4'''
*[[House Martell (Histories & Lore)]]
*[[The Bastards of Westeros]]
*[[House Baelish (Histories & Lore)]]
